```{r setup, include = FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(
  comment = "#>"
)
```

This package parses GEO raw data. 

GSE data consists of expression matrix and chip annotation.

```{r}
# expression matrix file
rGEO::read_gse_matrix('inst/extdata/GSE19161_series_matrix.txt.gz')

# chip annotation SOFT file
rGEO::read_gse_soft('inst/extdata/GSE19161_family.soft.gz')
```

# utilities to access GEO data

most useful functions: get path of GSE raw data file

```{r, collapse=TRUE}
rGEO::gse_soft_ftp('GSE19161')

rGEO::gse_matrix_ftp('GSE19161')
```

other functions

```{r, collapse=TRUE}
# GPL SOFT file
rGEO:::gpl_soft_ftp('GPL6947')

# ftp directory path
rGEO::gds_ftp('GDS479')
rGEO::gse_ftp('GSE3')
rGEO::gpl_ftp('GPL2570')
```
